term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - Z50 of a photochromic system

item.text: Number of cycles required to reduce by 50 % the initial absorbance of the coloured form of a photochromic compound at a specific wavelength.

sources.item: PAC, 2007, 79, 293. 'Glossary of terms used in photochemistry, 3rd edition (IUPAC Recommendations 2006)' on page 441 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac200779030293)
